Detailed Description

Record settings for the media recorder.
See also:
MediaRecorder

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum RecordSettings::MediaQuality
 

Video/audio Quality.

Enumerator:
QualityLow 
QualityNormal 
QualityHigh 

enum RecordSettings::MediaSinkType
 

The type of the media sink.

Enumerator:
FilePathname  the sink is of type Pathname (file name)
DataSink  the sink is of type Stream

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RecordSettings::RecordSettings (   ) 
 

DefaultConstructor

RecordSettings::~RecordSettings (   ) 
 

Default Destructor

RecordSettings::RecordSettings (  INT  frame_rate,
XYDIM  width,
XYDIM  height,
UINT8  camera_dev_id,
MediaQuality  video_quality,
MediaQuality  audio_quality,
MediaInfo::MediaCodec  video_codec,
MediaInfo::MediaCodec  audio_codec,
UINT32  max_file_size,
const char *  media_sink
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
frame_rate Video frame rate. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
width Video Width. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
height Video Height. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
camera_dev_id Camera's device ID of the camera to be used. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
video_quality Video encoding quality. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
audio_quality Audio encoding quality. If no audio is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
video_codec Video codec type to be used for encoding. If no video has to be recorded, this value has to be set to MediaInfo::UnknownCodec. If this value is set to MediaInfo::DefaultCodec, the Media Framework shall select a suitable/default video codec.
audio_codec Audio codec type to be used for encoding. If no audio has to be recorded, this value has to be set to MediaInfo::UnknownCodec. If this value is set to MediaInfo::DefaultCodec, the Media Framework shall select a suitable/default audio codec.
max_file_size Maximum recorded file size (in bytes). If this value is 0, the file size is not limited.
media_sink Pointer to the media sink (i.e. the recording target which the media is stored to).

RecordSettings::RecordSettings (  INT  frame_rate,
XYDIM  width,
XYDIM  height,
UINT8  camera_dev_id,
MediaQuality  video_quality,
MediaQuality  audio_quality,
MediaInfo::MediaCodec  video_codec,
MediaInfo::MediaCodec  audio_codec,
UINT32  max_file_size,
class DataSink *  media_sink
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
frame_rate Video frame rate. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
width Video Width. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
height Video Height. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
camera_dev_id Camera's device ID of the camera to be used. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
video_quality Video encoding quality. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
audio_quality Audio encoding quality. If no audio is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
video_codec Video codec type to be used for encoding. If no video has to be recorded, this value has to be set to MediaInfo::UnknownCodec. If this value is set to MediaInfo::DefaultCodec, the Media Framework shall select a suitable/default video codec.
audio_codec Audio codec type to be used for encoding. If no audio has to be recorded, this value has to be set to MediaInfo::UnknownCodec. If this value is set to MediaInfo::DefaultCodec, the Media Framework shall select a suitable/default audio codec.
max_file_size Maximum recorded file size (in bytes). If this value is 0, the file size is not limited.
media_sink Pointer to the media sink (i.e. the recording target which the media is stored to).

RecordSettings::RecordSettings (  void *  media_sink,
MediaSinkType  media_sink_type,
MediaInfo::MediaCodec  video_codec,
MediaQuality  video_quality,
INT  contrast,
INT  brightness,
BOOLEAN  camera_night_mode,
UINT32  max_file_size,
UINT32  max_recording_duration
) 
 

Constructor

Parameters:
media_sink A void pointer to Media Sink. This can be either a character pointer if media_sink_type is FilePathname or could be a DataSink pointer if media_sink_type is DataSink.
media_sink_type Could be either data sink or file path name.
video_codec Video codec type to be used for encoding. If no video has to be recorded, this value has to be set to MediaInfo::UnknownCodec. If this value is set to MediaInfo::DefaultCodec, the Media Framework shall select a suitable/default video codec.
video_quality Video encoding quality. If no video is recorded, this value shall be ignored.
contrast Camera Contrast during recording session. Takes any value between 0 & 10
brightness Camera brightness during recording session. Takes any value between 0 & 10.
max_file_size Maximum recorded file size (in bytes). If this value is 0, the file size is not limited.
max_file_size Maximum recorded file size (in bytes). If this value is 0, the file size is not limited.
media_sink Pointer to the media sink (i.e. the recording target which the media is stored to).
